prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with sharp stingers and vibrant wings that buzzes around flowers.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that resembles a bee but has a fierce look and striking colors.
Generate an insect-like Pokemon with multiple stingers and a sleek, aerodynamic design for quick movements.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a wasp, complete with a dangerous sting and agile flight.
Imagine a Pokemon with a yellow and black striped body, perfect for camouflage in its natural habitat.
Design a Pokemon that can glide through forests effortlessly, showcasing its beautiful transparent wings.
Show me a bug-type Pokemon that is both graceful and intimidating, with a unique color palette.
